catalog:
Ralls, Kim Midnight Rain Fantasy 5.95 2000-12-16 A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world. NT 1-->
Corets, Eva Maeve Ascendant Fantasy 5.95 2000-11-17 After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.
Corets, Eva Oberon's Legacy Fantasy 5.95NT 2--> 2001-03-10 In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.
Corets, Eva The Sundered Grail Fantasy 5.95 2001-09-10 <description>The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.
